item.title: Sustainability Reporting and the Creative Process
item.dc:creator: VicDesotelle
item.category: creativity sustainability reporting sustainable innovation design
item.description: Which of you are familiar with the concepts of creativity, innovation, and sustainability? I seek direction from you on how to incorporate ‘deep creative’ processes within Discovery Fuel’s emerging ‘sustainability reporting’ CoLaboratories. The sustainability reporting phenomena is a rapidly growing trend within organizations world-wide and covers all sectors including business, NGO’s, communities/cities, education, and government. […]
